languages.text: "Тот факт, что шут — брат девчонки, как и перемены в его поведении, только добавляет подозрений. Губернатор как-то связан с этими двумя: скоморохом, которому дозволяют слишком многое, и мелкой дворянкой, что неожиданно получила важную роль в празднестве".

"The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."
languages.original_text: "Тот факт, что шут — брат девчонки, как и перемены в его поведении, только добавляет подозрений. Губернатор как-то связан с этими двумя: скоморохом, которому дозволяют слишком многое, и мелкой дворянкой, что неожиданно получила важную роль в празднестве".

traits.locale_text: "The fact that the jester is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, and so do the alleged changes in his behaviour. The Governor has something to do with these two, a clown who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

"The fact that the jester is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the Governor and these two—a clown who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

"The fact that the jester is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the Governor and these two—a clown who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

"The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

"The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

languages.text: "Der Umstand, dass der Hofnarr Maives Bruder ist, erhärtet den Verdacht ... genau wie die angebliche Änderung seines Verhaltens. Es gibt eine Verbindung zwischen dem Gouverneur und diesen beiden ... ein Hornochse, der völlig aus dem Ruder läuft und eine niedere Adelige, der unerwartet eine wichtige Rolle bei den Festlichkeiten zuteil wurde."
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

traits.locale_text: "Der Umstand, dass der Hofnarr Maives Bruder ist, erhärtet den Verdacht ... genau wie die angebliche Änderung seines Verhaltens. Es gibt eine Verbindung zwischen dem Gouverneur und diesen beiden ... ein Hornochse, der völlig aus dem Ruder läuft und eine niedere Adelige, der unerwartet eine wichtige Rolle bei den Festlichkeiten zuteil wurde."

languages.text: « Il est d'autant plus suspect que le bouffon soit le frère de Maive, surtout en prenant également en considération ces histoires de comportement inhabituel. Il y a un lien entre le gouverneur et ces deux-là : un bouffon qui a carte blanche et une petite noble qui s'est vu confier à l'improviste un rôle important dans les festivités. »
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

traits.locale_text: « Il est d'autant plus suspect que le bouffon soit le frère de Maive, surtout en prenant également en considération ces histoires de comportement inhabituel. Il y a un lien entre le gouverneur et ces deux-là : un bouffon qui a carte blanche et une petite noble qui s'est vu confier à l'improviste un rôle important dans les festivités. »

languages.text: “那个宫廷小丑是梅芙的哥哥，他的行为与之前截然不同，这进一步加深了我的怀疑。那个总督与这两个人之间存在着某种联系——先是那个小丑肆意妄为，无人阻拦；接下来又是这个无足轻重的贵族姑娘，不知出于什么原因，在这场庆典中意外担任了重要角色。”
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

traits.locale_text: “那个宫廷小丑是梅芙的哥哥，他的行为与之前截然不同，这进一步加深了我的怀疑。那个总督与这两个人之间存在着某种联系——先是那个小丑肆意妄为，无人阻拦；接下来又是这个无足轻重的贵族姑娘，不知出于什么原因，在这场庆典中意外担任了重要角色。”

languages.text: «Saber que el bufón de la corte es el hermano de Maive solo aviva mis sospechas, al igual que los presuntos cambios en su comportamiento. Hay alguna relación entre el gobernador y estos dos: un bufón al que se le da rienda suelta y una noble menor a la que se ha asignado una labor importante en los festejos».
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

traits.locale_text: «Saber que el bufón de la corte es el hermano de Maive solo aviva mis sospechas, al igual que los presuntos cambios en su comportamiento. Hay alguna relación entre el gobernador y estos dos: un bufón al que se le da rienda suelta y una noble menor a la que se ha asignado una labor importante en los festejos».

languages.text: 「道化がメイヴの兄であるという事実は、彼の言動の変化と同様に、疑念を一層深める要因となっています。総督とこの二人の間には、何らかの関係があるように思われます。野放しにされている道化と、思いがけず祝祭において重要な役割を任された下級貴族の女性なのです」
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."

traits.locale_text: 「道化がメイヴの兄であるという事実は、彼の言動の変化と同様に、疑念を一層深める要因となっています。総督とこの二人の間には、何らかの関係があるように思われます。野放しにされている道化と、思いがけず祝祭において重要な役割を任された下級貴族の女性なのです」

languages.text: "Saray soytarısının Maive'in kardeşi olması, davranışlarındaki değişim iddiaları gibi şüpheleri artırıyor. Vali ile bu ikisi arasında bir bağlantı var... Soytarının boş boş dolaşmasına izin verilmesi, bu küçük soylunun şenliklerde beklenmedik şekilde önemli görevler alması..."
languages.original_text: "The fact that the court fool is Maive's brother only adds to the suspicion, as do the alleged changes in his behaviour. There is some connection between the governor and these two — a buffoon who is permitted to run wild and a minor noblewoman who has unexpectedly been given an important role in the festivities."
